bs-notifications-addacount:
Short message that a user was created. Parameters:
* $1 username of the created user
bs-notifications-email-addaccount-subjec:
A user was created. Parameters:
* $1 the username of the created user
* $2 the realname of the created user
bs-notifications-email-addaccount-body:
A user was created with link to userpage. Parameters:
* $1 the userpagelink
* $2 user name
* $3 user real name
bs-notifications-edit:
Short message that a page was edited. Parameters:
* $1 pagename of the edited page
bs-notifications-email-edit-subject:
A page was edited by a user. Parameters:
* $1 page that was edited
* $2 username of the user edited the page
* $3 real name of the user who edited the page
bs-notifications-email-edit-body:
A page was edited by a user. Parameters:
* $1 edited page
* $2 username
* $3 summary of edit
* $4 link to edited page
* $5 difflink to the page (&curid=10&diff=22&oldid=21)
* $6 is the real name of the user who edited the page
bs-notifications-create:
Short message that a page was edited. Parameters:
* $1 pagename of the created page
bs-notifications-email-create-subject:
Short message that a page was edited by a user. Parameters:
* $1 pagename of the created page
* $2 username
* $3 user real name of the user who created the page
bs-notifications-email-create-body:
A page was created by a user with link to the page. Parameters:
* $1 page that was created
* $2 username
* $3 summary of page creation
* $4 link to the page
* $5 difflink - not in use
* $6 is the real name of the user who created the page
bs-notifications-delete:
Short message that a page was edited. Parameters:
* $1 pagename of the deleted page
bs-notifications-email-delete-subject:
A page was edited by a user. Parameters:
* $1 page that was edited
* $2 username of the user edited the page
* $3 real name of the user who edited the page
bs-notifications-email-delete-body:
A page was edited by a user. Parameters:
* $1 edited page
* $2 username
* $3 summary of edit
* $4 link to edited page
* $5 difflink to the page (&curid=10&diff=22&oldid=21)
* $6 is the real name of the user who edited the page
bs-notifications-move:
Short message that a page was edited. Parameters:
* $1 pagename of the moved page
bs-notifications-email-move-subject:
A page was moved by a user. Parameters:
* $1 page that was moved
* $2 username
* $3 new title of the page
* $4 real name of the user who moved the page
bs-notifications-email-move-body:
A page was moved to another target by a user. Parameters:
* $1 page that was moved
* $2 username
* $3 new pagename
* $4 link to new pagename
* $5 is the real name of the user who moved the page
